assessmentItem.title: Choose either Stanley Milgram’s or Laud Humphreys’ research and identify at least two ethical problems with the study you chose. What changes could the researcher have made to their work to avoid being unethical?

prompt.span: Choose either Stanley Milgram’s or Laud Humphreys’ research and identify at least two ethical problems with the study you chose. What changes could the researcher have made to their work to avoid being unethical?
